long_desc.thetext: Thanks Noopur, I'll take a look.

There were two problems:
- Selection parser was building a wrong parse tree - having gotten out of alignment due to a missing pop.
- Hover at catch formal parameter declaration site never worked previously even without lambdas being in the picture as the resolution was simply not happening.
Fix and tests here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=b6755ce2d08e0d5d352a051fea787f1496b49482
Thanks Noopur.
